text: www. wmagazine. com / Sunday, 10 September 2017 08 : 45 : 00 On Wednesday night, fashion designer Tom Ford kicked off New York Fashion Week with a star - studded front row : singer Ciara made her first post - baby appearance, sitting alongside the likes of Kim Kardashian, Julianne Moore, Ansel Elgort, and Cindy Crawford. And that's just the beginning. Thursday brought appearances by actresses Katie Holmes, Kate Mara, and Rachel Bilson, as well as Yolanda Hadid and more Cindy Crawford, while the weekend saw the emergence of Nicki Minaj and even the musician Lionel Richie, catching his daughter Sofia walk for the first time
